MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Amlwch, affecting properties in Pen Bonc Road, Wendon Drive and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:25 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required to locate the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:58 am on 7th April, 2021.
